member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE
member.summary: Defines constants that specify options around threading affinity for a new DispatcherQueueController.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE.DQTYPE_THREAD_DEDICATED
member.summary: Specifies that the DispatcherQueue for the DispatcherQueueController will be created on a dedicated thread.

member.name: DISPATCHERQUEUE_THREAD_TYPE.DQTYPE_THREAD_CURRENT
member.summary: Specifies that the DispatcherQueue for the DispatcherQueueController will be created on the caller's thread.
